step_feedback.feedback: Great job stretching your arm overhead! Ensure you feel that gentle resistance to help with lymph flow.
Excellent! Keep your palm and fingers wide open in this step.
Nicely done making a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles.
Perfect! Open your hand while exhaling and relaxing your muscles, visualizing the fluid movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arm overhead, open your hand wide, and then make a fist while breathing in. Repeat this motion to help move lymph fluid.
